l, be = test_map.bispectrum(l_edges, configuration='equilateral', scale=lambda
    x: x ** 4 / (2.0 * np.pi) ** 2)
l, bf = test_map.bispectrum(l_edges, configuration='folded', ratio=0.5,
    scale=lambda x: x ** 4 / (2.0 * np.pi) ** 2)
fig, ax = plt.subplots()
ax.plot(l, np.abs(be), label='$\\ell_1=\\ell_2=\\ell_3=\\ell$')
ax.plot(l, np.abs(bf), label='$\\ell_1=\\ell,\\ell_2=\\ell_3=\\ell/2$')
ax.set_xscale('log')
ax.set_yscale('log')
ax.set_xlabel('$\\ell$')
ax.set_ylabel(
    '$(\\ell_1\\ell_2\\ell_3)^{4/3}B(\\ell_1,\\ell_2,\\ell_3)/(2\\pi)^2$')
ax.legend()
plt.savefig('kappa_bispectrum.png')
plt.clf()
